name: TREASURE SAMURAISLAND
description:
It's Pirates vs Ninjas... well, it's one pirate vs a load of pixel art samurais.

This is my second ever game, and the first in my self inflicted challenge to complete 12 basic games in a year. It's a platformer. There are collectables. There is combat. There is some really nice movement stuff. There are bugs. I hope you enjoy it.

If you want a real challenge, are two categories I suggest you speedrun if you fancy it.... any% is just collect the final treasure chest in world 4-3 as quickly as possible. 100% would be doing the same but collecting all 60 pints of grog on the way. Happy gaming, gamer.

12 Games in 12 Months: 1/12

DankNStein Games #002
